content: oh so here we go I've taken a washer and hot glued it to this piece of paper and
I've cut some barbecue skewers up and I'm gonna put some white glue on here
and just start stacking the pieces of wood in a nice pattern it looks like a
campfire now just go around and place those in
there so there we go got a nice nice grouping there so now I want to add some
ash to the fire so I'm just going to use some place and and just pour it right
over that and I'll just let that dry up and I'll be ready to go to the next step
okay so here at my fires painting them up somewhat and you can check out my
other video here to see how I did that and here I'm going to add some red and
finish them off with some Brown around the edge and some black to make it look
like it's burned the wood is burned so fill that in so here we go we're all
dried up there and I'm going to add this hot glue that you can see in this video
here how I do this so I'm gonna add the hot glue to the campfire let's glue the
bottom there stick it right on you know do a little bit glue on the edge and
just kind of pull it up so it blends right into the fire the hot glue fire
there itself so just keep pulling up until that all blends into the base you
get a nice adhesion on the hot glue so there we go that's all done but of
course it doesn't have any color so we need to fix that so we will add our fire
colors here I've got a bright yellow bright orange and
the classic red so I wanted this yellow down quite a bit because I want the fire
to remain bit translucent so light will actually pass through this so I'll just
let that dry up for a minute before I apply the red and now I'm gonna put some
red on and just hit the tips with the red you just kind of pull down
that'll give a nice look to that so just fill it in a little bit not too much
there we go nice looking fire we'll let that dry up so here we go here's our
fire and looks really nice you can see that that's it's still a bit translucent
and the light kind of goes through that I think it's a really nice effect of
these fires and that's a great little campfire it's got the weight with the
